components: With Admincore, in-game announcements and broadcasts are a breeze to send.
You can freeze players with bad intentions to keep them from damaging your server.
Admincore logs all punishments both in-game, in Discord, and plugin files.
Players and staff-members can easily report other players with just a few clicks.
Staff have an intuitive and extensive report managment system, allowing your team to simplify your workflow.
Keep up-to-date on statistics of your server like TPS, ping, resource usage, and more.
Staff members have access to a secret staff channel, allowing them to talk privately and receive staff notifications.
Discord and Minecraft messages can be linked in staffchat, allowing offline staff to stay in the know too.
Staffmode is Admincore's staff hub. Your team can manage all aspects of moderation inside Staffmode, from just inspection and chatting to handing out punishments.
With security in mind, Staffmode makes players think staff are offline when staff enter, allowing them to catch players in the act.
The Staffmode UI allows staff members to inspect, report, and punish all from one simple interface.
Staff can inspect suspicious players and keep tabs on everything from their known aliases to inventory and even their behavior throughought the internet.
Admincore checks for updates every time it runs, meaning you'll always know when its time to switch to a new version.
Admincore verifies your configuration's validity, making sure your config is compatible with the current Admincore version.
Beyond simple logging and chatting, Admincore integrates itself into Discord in other ways, like player inspection and freezing.
Admincore manages appeals from punished players, allowing developers to hook into its API and bring appeal revewing to the game itself.
Besides revewing appeals, Admincore also allows staff to manage appeals and accept or reject them.
Admincore can broadcast information plugin wide, allowing developers to send messages directly to server administrators.
Admincore takes error logging to the next level, giving tips on how to help solve errors and logging errors with verbosity to help diagnose problems.
permissions: Allows a staff member to use the full functionality of Admincore. This includes access to sensitive information.

Allows a staff member to check the statistics of a player including sensitive information. This also allows the staff member to see sensitive information of the server, if sensitive protection is enabled. This gives the staff member access to staffmode.
Allows a staff member to check the statistics of a player excluding sensitive information. This gives the staff member access to staffmode.
Allows a staff member to use all feautres of Admincore, excluding sending announcements and viewing sensitive player information and sensitive server information with sensitive protection enabled.
Allows a staff member to view and manage punishment appeals.
Allows a staff member to freeze and unfreeze a player.
Allows a staff member to view the server's statistics. Requires admincore.trusted to show sensitive information if sensitive protection is enabled.
Allows a staff member to use all permissions staffmode requires.
Allows a staff member to inspect another player.
Allows a staff member to ban a player.
Allows a staff member to ban a player temporarily.
Allows a staff member to mute a player.
Allows a staff member to view a player's aliases.
Allows a staff member to view the punishment history of a player.
Allows a staff member to pardon banned players
Allows a staff member to pardon banned IP addresses.
Allows a staff member to IP ban players.
Allows a staff member to kick a player.
Base permission for Admincore. This permission is the child of all of Admincore's other permissions as all staff need this permission.
